about_the_game:
This is a trial version.


We recommend that you play the demo version to make sure the game runs properly on your PC before purchasing the full version.

◆Overview


Players become clerks at 'LingerieS', a high-end women's lingerie specialty store, listening to various requests from female customers and coordinating lingerie that fits them perfectly.

The characters and CG animate, sway, and bounce around!!

◆Story


The main character, Aoi Miyamae, is a male university student.
Aoi's twin sister, Riko Miyamae, has a different gender from Aoi, but they are identical in appearance and facial features.
Riko works as a clerk at 'LingerieS', a high-end women's lingerie specialty store. However, she wants to take two months off from her job to catch up with her favorite band on their national tour. However, she can't afford to miss work.
So, Riko asks Aoi, who looks exactly like her, to dress up as a woman and work at 'LingerieS' instead of her.
Of course, Aoi firmly refuses. However, Aoi reluctantly agrees to Riko's request.
Aoi enters a high-class women's lingerie specialty store for the first time in his life. He dresses as a woman and works as a clerk at the store.
While working as a clerk at 'LingerieS', Aoi discovers the depth of women's lingerie, interacts with the women who visit the store, and deepens his bond with them...

◆Characters










◆Staff


Planning/Plot: Kigurumi
Illustration: Oryo, Ryuu.
Scenario: Norimitsu Taira
Music: Tetsuya Mizoguchi

content_descriptors.notes:
This game may contain content that is not appropriate for viewing by all ages or in the workplace: general adult content.

This game contains content that is not appropriate for all ages, including partial nudity and sexual themes.

All characters involved in sexual content are 18 years of age or older.

name: LingerieS / ランジェリーズ Demo
publishers: Ramune Games / ラムネゲームズ
short_description: The main character, Aoi Miyamae, is asked by his twin sister, Riko, to dress up as a woman and work as a clerk at 'LingerieS', a high-end women's lingerie specialty store, in her place. Aoi discovers the depth of women's lingerie and develops a bond with the women who visit the store...
supported_languages:
English, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Japanese*
*languages with full audio support
